Package gameplay.gameobject.powerups

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Powerup
    Interface which defines the behavior of a powerup
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BombPassPowerup
    BombPass powerup which allows bomberman to move through bombs.
    BombPowerup
    Bomb powerup which allows bomberman to place additional bombs.
    DetonatorPowerup
    Powerup which allows bomberman to detonate bombs.
    Door
    Class implementing the door object.
    FlamePassPowerup
    Powerup which makes bomberman immune to fire.
    FlamePowerup
    Powerup which increase the explosion radius of bombs.
    SpeedPowerup
    Powerup which increase the movement speed of bomberman.
    WallPassPowerup
    Powerup which allows bomberman to move through walls.
